distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for raptor fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-25713: Fixed an out of bounds access triggered via a
  malformed input file (bsc#1178903).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A malformed input file can lead to a segfault due to an out of bounds array access in raptor_xml_writer_start_element_common.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
